title: ADUC+ 1.0.1.6 (Active Directory)
description:
*******************************************************************************
           	        ADUC+ 1.0.1.6 (c) 2009 Vision IT
*******************************************************************************


Release: ADUC+ 1.0.1.6

Date: 03/03/2009

Cracked By: Nixkap



Type.................: Utility
Platform.............: XP/W2K3/Vista
Serial #.............: Yes
Compression Format...: Zip
Copy Protection......: Registration/Trial


RELEASE NOTES

        
	Everything you wished you could do with Microsoft's Active
	Directory Users and Computers, but can't...
	
	

FEATURES

	* Roll Back
	Ever made a mistake and spent days fixing it?

	* Restore deleted objects
	Ever wanted to restore a user object WITH all its properties,
	such as its group memberships and telephone number etc?

	* List Last LogonsObsolete objects
	Ever wanted to find out which user and computer objects are
	obsolete and can be safely disabled or deleted?

	* Extensive search and replace
	Ever needed to change a single attribute of multiple objects?

	* Bulk Import
	Ever had to create hundreds of users in a hurry? Or, let's
	say, twenty at a time every day?

	* Find services and processes
	Ever needed to find out on which computers a certain process
	or service is running?

	* Computers and their users
	Ever wanted to find out who's logged on to which of the six
	hundred computers in your network?

	* Direct File System access
	Ever got bored having to create the umptieth mapping in order
	to find out which user to add to what security group in order
	to give someone access to your file system?

	* Remote Shutdown/Restart/Logoff
	Ever needed to shutdown, reboot or force logoff two hundred
	machines simultaneously?

	* Group Membership Change
	Ever did the laborious job of adding fifty users to a
	security group?

	* Effective Group Membership
	Ever tried to find out the effective group membership of any
	user, group or computer in your Active Directory?

	* Hardware Information
	Ever needed to find out the current IP settings, CPU or other
	hardware info of all the machines in your network?

	* Extended search options
	Ever tried to find out which user accounts are locked out at
	any point in time? Or tried to get that list of groups and 
	their members for your manager? Or had to produce a list of
	all the printers in your network?	
 

For More Info on ADUC+ 1.0.1.6 Visit:
       <a href=" http://www.vision-it.org" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.vision-it.org</a>


INSTALLATION NOTES

	- Run Aduc+
	- Enter the username & license Code
        - Enjoy
